meanings.definition: The quality or state of being blimpish
meanings.sent1: Her blimpishnesses were evident in her stubborn refusal to change her mind.
meanings.sent2: The blimpishnesses of the old man made him resistant to new ideas.
meanings.sent3: Despite his blimpishnesses, he was still loved by everyone for his kind heart.
meanings.sent4: The blimpishnesses of the politician's actions were clear to all who observed.
meanings.sent5: The blimpishnesses of the cat's behavior made it endearing to its owner.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of resembling a blimp
meanings.sent1: The blimpishnesses of the cloud made it look like a giant cotton ball in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The blimpishnesses of the balloon were striking against the blue sky.
meanings.sent3: The blimpishnesses of the cake made it a whimsical centerpiece at the party.
meanings.sent4: The blimpishnesses of the building's design gave it a unique and futuristic look.
meanings.sent5: The blimpishnesses of the pillow made it perfect for a cozy nap.

meanings.definition: The behavior or attitude of a blimp
meanings.sent1: His blimpishnesses at the party, floating around without a care, amused everyone.
meanings.sent2: The blimpishnesses of the child pretending to be a blimp brought laughter to the room.
meanings.sent3: The blimpishnesses of the dog trying to float like a blimp was a hilarious sight.
meanings.sent4: Her blimpishnesses in the face of danger surprised even the bravest of warriors.
meanings.sent5: The blimpishnesses of the robot's movements made it seem almost alive.
